|}}'''Mines of Moria 3''' is a text-adventure MS-DOS game, released by [[Ketchup Games]] in [[1999]].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/mom3.html Mines of Moria 3] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 21 April 2011)</ref><ref name="El Anillo">[http://www.meristation.com/v3/des_articulo.php?pic=GEN&id=2254&idj=&idp=&tipo=art&c=1&pos=9 Meristation, El Anillo interactivo] p. 10 (retrieved 21 April 2011)</ref> ''Mines of Moria 3'' formed the third and final part of the ''[[Mines of Moria (video game series)|Mines of Moria]]'' trilogy.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="El Anillo"/> The hero of the trilogy, [[Feagwaith]], must return to [[Gondor]] and deliver a medicine.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref name="El Anillo"/> The game is written by [[Adam Roberts]].<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 21 April 2011)</ref>
